entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,113Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 130

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until you can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready.  --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Yes, the title has changed! It is still from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: Lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: KilldevilandtheWildThings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 176,020Chapters: 31/34Kudos: 1,202

Summary: Buck had lost-- he was sure of this now. His resolve only lasted a few weeks before his exterior began to crack; he was never a very good actor. He couldn’t keep up the greetings and the asking questions and the easy stroll. He let his shoulders creep up to his ears, let his foot tap incessantly. He did what his Captain told him, but stopped asking for anything more. Stopped following the conversation in the back of the engine on the way to the call; he just stared out the window, thinking about the case to come, preparing for it. When he woke every morning, there was no big recovery milestone to strive for, no big fight for the soul of his career to win. Not even the happy swell of being back on shift -- something so easy to dismiss, that had dominated so much of his life, that he had taken for granted-- that had catalyzed him each morning of his first week back.An old habit of his had returned. A bad habit.~~or: after the lawsuit, buck confronts what it was he wanted all along. he looks and looks and longs for it; the team looks right through him. buck breaks-- right down the middle.

entry.title: kitchen flowers
entry.summary:
Author: spiderkola

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,795Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 2

Summary: The slow shuffle out of the chapel felt clumsy, almost embarrassingly ordinary. With the priest gone, so too was the illusion of sanctity. Eddie felt human again—tethered to the ground, stripped of significance. Every step was an echo, his body heavy and his thought heavier. The sky outside was no brighter than it had been when they arrived. He turned to Buck, words forming before he had the courage to speak them.But then Buck looked at him. And Eddie stopped.It hit him, then—not that Buck was handsome in some odd or unconventional way. No, he was devastating; breathtaking in a way that felt almost impossible to define.“What did you learn?” Buck asked, his voice even, neutral. That I could deny myself of joy; spend a lifetime convincing myself you’re not the person I want; force myself to find love in tighter arms—and still, no one comes close to you. I promise you, you’re better than the rest.  Or,Glances in London and heartbreak in Vienna. Somewhere between maps, museums, and shared silence, they forgot not to fall in love.

Summary: Evan, who is referred to as Buck, has faced significant hardships since a fallen tree severely injured his leg, preventing him from pursuing his lifelong dream of becoming a firefighter. Following a difficult breakup with a domineering boyfriend, he experiences a moment of realization while watching one of his favourite adult film stars. This epiphany leads him to consider a new path: entering the adult film industry, and leveraging his youth, attractiveness, and strong physique.Eddie Diaz, Single father of one, ex-military after two tours in Afghanistan wearer of a silver star, and now seasoned Adult film star

Author: evanbuckleyreincarnated

We’ll start slow.”He smiled at the way Buck was just standing there, waiting for Eddie to give him instructions. Still a little hesitant, he moved closer to Buck, and held out his hands – almost touching him, but not quite.“Do you trust me?” -------------- Buck finds out about Eddie's dancing past, and demands he teaches him. As they dance in the living room they share, feelings surface.

entry.title: You've Hit Rock Bottom (Lost at Sea)
entry.summary:
Author: Curator_Of_Chaos

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,063Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 53

Summary: Eddie Diaz never dropped Christopher off the morning of the tsunami. Buck still finds himself at the pier anyway. With no one knowing his location, everyone believes he's safe when the warning comes, but no one can reach Buck's cellphone. That all comes crashing down when the crew of Firehouse 118 stumbles across a firetruck with a group of people on top of it, all seemingly unharmed but begging them to find the bleeding firefighter who saved them after he was swept back out to sea when the water began to recede. It quickly becomes a race against time and the rapidly dying light of the sun to find Buck before it's too late.They can only pray that their missing member wasn't drifting out at sea.News flash: he was.Join the 118 as they desperately search for Buck as he fights to get back to them; one way or another.

entry.title: and if it all ended tomorrow (would I be the one on your mind?)
entry.summary:
Author: poetvienna

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,160Chapters: 5/7Kudos: 47

Summary: Buckley has always believed his life was defined by loneliness and abandonment. The emptiness in his heart and the burden of his own presence became constant companions, and every attempt to find love seemed destined to fail. But one night changes everything.An unexpected revelation after a night of secrets sets Buck on an emotionally devastating journey. He finds himself in love with Eddie Diaz—his best friend, someone he has always considered his family. Yet fate, cruel in its unpredictability, delivers another blow: Buck discovers he’s expecting a child, the result of something Eddie doesn’t even remember.As Eddie plans a new life in Texas, Buck is left to grapple with the chaos of his own truth: to fight for a love he has never dared to confess or to accept the lonely path that feels like his destiny. Amid the storm of emotions, his courage will be tested, and the weight of secrets may change everything.
